        public long login(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  ClientType clientType)
           throws InvalidLoginException
        Login into system using name, password and client type
        Specified by:
        login in interface AdminService
        Parameters:
        name - Name of client
        password - User password
        clientType - Type of client - Should be 'Administrator'
        Returns:
        id is always 0 for administrator user
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - When credentials are invalid for administrator

      • removeExpiredCoupons

        @Transactional
public void removeExpiredCoupons()
